daily_fact: The popular Italian sandwich shop on the Upper West Side has unveiled new signage, enhancing its visibility and inviting more locals to enjoy its delicious offerings.
topline_md: New York City faces significant challenges as a nor’easter threatens Halloween festivities with heavy rain and strong winds, while panic buttons return to schools amid safety concerns, and residents report discolored tap water, raising health questions.

risks_alerts.title: Risks & Alerts
